items.sentence: I\'ve already given Tom his birthday present.
Where do you think Tom bought his motorcycle?
Where do you want to go this summer vacation?
Where were you and Tom the night before last?
Are you sure you\'re ready to come back home?
Aren\'t you being just a little unreasonable?
Aren\'t you going to be at the party tonight?
Aren\'t you going to do something about that?
I suspected Tom had fallen in love with Mary.
I can\'t believe you didn\'t have to do that.
Mary is my third daughter\'s oldest daughter.
I\'m not the person who should be doing this.
I think Tom might want to go bowling with us.
I\'m pretty sure Tom doesn\'t know I\'m here.
Tom wasn\'t able to buy everything we needed.
Tom wasn\'t able to convince Mary to do that.
Tom didn\'t want anyone to see him with Mary.
We don\'t need any more volunteers right now.
Do you want to talk about what just happened?
I only found out about it purely by accident.
I think that I forgot to turn off the lights.
I think that I forgot to turn the lights off.
Tom will be staying in Boston for a few days.
It\'ll take a while for this rash to go away.
Tom cut down all the trees in his front yard.
Tom decided he was too old for rock climbing.
We don\'t feed our dog anything but dog food.
I should know by now not to ask Tom for help.
I have a right to know what\'s going on here.
Tom wouldn\'t lend Mary the books she wanted.
Tom wouldn\'t let me look at his photo album.
Tom decided to do what he could to help Mary.
Tom devoted a lot of time to studying French.
I\'m sure that Tom will win the tennis match.
I\'m sure you two would like some time alone.
I don\'t get paid as much as I\'d like to be.
I\'ll do that tomorrow even if it\'s raining.
I\'ve already told Tom what I want him to do.
I don\'t get a lot of requests for that song.
Fortunately, Tom didn\'t die in the accident.
Tom wants all these reports finished by 2:30.
Tom wants to be a carpenter when he grows up.
Tom said he didn\'t have any books in French.
Tom said he didn\'t know who that person was.
You\'re the one who taught me how to do this.
You haven\'t been paying attention, have you?
You know what Tom is going to do, don\'t you?
Tom asked me what Mary\'s father\'s name was.
Tom didn\'t know if he should really do that.
Tom wants to learn how to play the xylophone.
